name: Mighty Oak Tree
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="leavesGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,180,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,130,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="trunkGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(139,69,19);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(101,48,15);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="150" r="150" fill="url(#leavesGrad)" />
  <path d="M 230 450 L 282 450 L 300 190 L 212 190 Z" fill="url(#trunkGrad)" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="450" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#663300" opacity="0.5" />
</svg>

name: Pine Conifer Tree
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="pineGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(0,150,0);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(0,100,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="pineTrunkGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,60,30);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(80,40,15);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 256 50 L L 400 350 L 112 350 Z" fill="url(#pineGrad)" />
  <rect x="246" y="350" width="20" height="100" fill="url(#pineTrunkGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Round Bush
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="bushGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="50%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,220,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(80,180,80);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="400" rx="100" ry="30" fill="#333333" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="130" fill="url(#bushGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Amanita Mushroom
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="capGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,0,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="stemGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="230" y="300" width="52" height="150" fill="url(#stemGrad)" />
  <path d="M 180 300 C 180 200, 332 200, 332 300 Z" fill="url(#capGrad)" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="270" r="10" fill="white" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="260" r="8" fill="white" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="220" r="12" fill="white" />
</svg>

name: Tulip Flower
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="petalGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="stemGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 256 150 C 230 100, 282 100, 256 150 Z" fill="url(#petalGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 150 C 210 200, 302 200, 256 150 Z" fill="url(#petalGrad)" />
  <path d="M 250 150 L 262 150 L 262 450 L 250 450 Z" fill="url(#stemGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Fallen Log
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="logGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,50,20);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="logEndGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,100,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="300" cy="430" rx="180" ry="40" fill="url(#logGrad)" transform="rotate(-10, 300, 430)" />
  <circle cx="115" cy="420" r="35" fill="url(#logEndGrad)" transform="rotate(-10, 115, 420)" />
  <path d="M 100 410 C 150 410, 150 430, 100 430 Z" fill="url(#logEndGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Single Green Leaf
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,180,50);stop-opacity:1" />

</svg>

name: Ivy Vine
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="vineGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(20,80,20);stop-opacity:1" />

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />

  <path d="M 100 450 C 150 350, 300 250, 350 50" stroke="url(#vineGrad)" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />

  <circle cx="280" cy="280" r="15" fill="url(#smallLeafGrad)" />

</svg>

name: Acorn

name: Sunflower

name: Single Fern Frond
svg_content:

    <linearGradient id="frondGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">

name: Red Poppy Flower
